description.@en: Inhaling deeply, you belch forth a gout of flame and smoke.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, any foes caught in its Cone Template suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage from fire. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but they are set On Fire instead. Your foes can successfully Resist with a Coordination Test.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but all foes struck automatically fail to Resist.

criticalFailure.@en: A grave mishap has occurred, as your breath uncontrollably ignites everything around you in an Explosion Template, centered on you. Those exposed suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage from fire, including yourself as you are seared from inside. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but they are set On Fire instead.

reagents.@en: The hide of a desert creature
